commentBody: The Jets must fire Bowles, not because he’s a poor Coach, but because he lost control & the respect of his team, which simply stopped playing for him.The Jets should trade their defensive line o Cleveland, or any other poor team that will take them, and the same goes for their offensive Line.The defensive secondary are simply inept, along with their Line Backers. In summary, they have to start all over, & pick the best athletes in the draft, & buy the best athletes whose contracts are up.The only one I would keep is Powell the Full Back, who should have been used more.
